documentation.text:
@title V2.1 Upgrader
 @dev Read docs/v2.1_upgrade.md

@notice The address of the FiatTokenProxy contract
 @return Contract address

@notice The address of the FiatTokenV2 implementation contract
 @return Contract address

@notice The address of the V2UpgraderHelper contract
 @return Contract address
@notice Withdraw any USDC in the contract
@notice Transfer proxy admin role to newProxyAdmin, and self-destruct

@title V2.1 Upgrader
 @dev Read docs/v2.1_upgrade.md

@notice The address of the FiatTokenProxy contract
 @return Contract address

@notice The address of the FiatTokenV2 implementation contract
 @return Contract address

@notice The address of the V2UpgraderHelper contract
 @return Contract address
@notice Withdraw any USDC in the contract
@notice Transfer proxy admin role to newProxyAdmin, and self-destruct

params.lostAndFound: The address to which the locked funds are sent
params.newProxyAdmin: Grantee of proxy admin role after upgrade

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

abortUpgrade().notice: Transfer proxy admin role to newProxyAdmin, and self-destruct

helper().notice: The address of the V2UpgraderHelper contract

implementation().notice: The address of the FiatTokenV2 implementation contract

lostAndFound().notice: The address to which the locked funds will be sent as part of the initialization process

newProxyAdmin().notice: The address to which the proxy admin role will be transferred after the upgrade is completed

proxy().notice: The address of the FiatTokenProxy contract

upgrade().notice: Upgrade, transfer proxy admin role to a given address, run a sanity test, and tear down the upgrader contract, in a single atomic transaction. It rolls back if there is an error.

withdrawUSDC().notice: Withdraw any USDC in the contract
